title: Pork Chops & Goat Cheese | Sal Vulcano & Chris Distefano Present: Hey Babe! | EP 21
description:
Hey Babe! is a podcast where comedians Chris Distefano and Sal Vulcano share stories and have fun. Let your hair down & come hang out with the BABES!


This episode the Babes talk foods they have never tried and then TRY THEM! Chris has never had a pork chop, goat cheese, or bologna. Sal has never had a cinnabon! The babes try out these foods to start off today's show! CHRIS OFFICIALLY HATES GOATS. Chris almost triggers Sal to vomit YASSSSS. Shout out Azúcar!!!! The babes are ASMR. Chris gets a chihuahua lesson. Pregnancy cravings are WILD! Snoring is the worst. Chris got an M & M stuck up his nose and his mother called the fire department. Chris talks about how it is to live on the road with Sal. The babes go antiquing! Chris looks like JFK in Sal's glasses. Did Rock Hudson die of a plane crash or AIDS? Do you put ice cubes in your cereal? Does almond milk go bad? Sal is the KING of room service. You ever eat in the shower?! You ever eat left over food off someone else' plate? Sal has......Sal talks about the time he had to do a stand up comedy show but had no voice. BRUTES! The babes talk about times they've been on stage and get sick during a show. THE TALES OF FLESPO.....a kid from Chris' grade school who puked into Chris' bookbag. What is Bologna made of? Why did they throw saw dust on vomit back in school?! SHOUT OUT KLUMP. Chris tries bologna and things don't go great! LOVE YA BABES!


Rate us on iTunes!


https://linktr.ee/Nopreshnetwork


Follow The Show!


Instagram - https://www.instagram.com/heybabepod/


Twitter - https://twitter.com/heybabepod


 


 

Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
